Key Match Events: Marcus Semien hit a two-run home run
Mitch Garver had a run-scoring single
Corey Seager homered three times and drove in six runs
Josh Jung and Nathaniel Lowe singled to open the ninth inning and scored on an error by Arizona's Alek Thomas
Josh Sborz struck out Ketel Marte to end the game
Post-Match Reflections: Marcus Semien expressed his emotions about the win
Nathaniel Lowe spoke about the team's road performance
Jonah Heim expressed pride in the team's accomplishments
Bruce Bochy thanked his players and expressed his gratitude for the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers went undefeated in 11 contests on the road
The Rangers had reached the World Series in 2010 and 2011, losing both times
Zac Gallen kept Texas hitless through six innings
Others: The Rangers defeated the Arizona Diamondbacks 5-0 to win the World Series
Bruce Bochy won his fourth World Series title at age 68
Arizona stranded runners at first base in the seventh and eighth innings
